testDialogue.name: Pilot
testDialogue.dialogue: You're not going to [wave amp=50 freq=2]believe[/wave] this, but I just watched a space [rainbow freq=0.2 sat=10 val=20]whale[/rainbow] fly through a [tornado radius=5 freq=2]nebula[/tornado] and it was the most [shake rate=5 level=10]beautiful[/shake] thing I've ever [fade start=2 length=12]seen in my life.[/fade]

testDialogue.name: Commander
testDialogue.dialogue: Hey, if you're not [wave amp=50 freq=3]busy[/wave], could you pick up groceries on this flyby of this star system?

testDialogue.name: Pilot
testDialogue.dialogue: What, no, go get your own groceries. I'm busy here! Blam! Blam! See? Shooting pirates or something!

level1Intro.name: Commander
level1Intro.dialogue: How are you finding your ship? The TitanCoreX Shielding doesn't let us build anything big, so this was the best we could give you.

level1Intro.name: Pilot
level1Intro.dialogue: The lack of air-conditioning for my legs is unfortunate, but at least the noise dampeners work fine. The jumpsuit has pockets so that's a plus.

level1Intro.name: Commander
level1Intro.dialogue: Right... Just try not to ruin it. Cloning you isn't free, and neither is the ship. We're going over a simulation today about the sorts of things you might expect to see in the field.

level1Intro.name: Commander
level1Intro.dialogue: Take a moment to get your handling. Fiddle with the dice, write your name on it, get the seat warmers right, whatever it is that you need.

level1Intro.name: Commander
level1Intro.dialogue: You can use [color=#ff3333]%s%s%s%s[/color] to pilot the ship and [color=#ff3333]%s[/color] to slow yourself down. You can see your pilot seat when you're moving slow.

level1Intro.name: Pilot
level1Intro.dialogue: You're making this sound like it's a game or something. I've got the control wheel and it's handling fine.

level1Intro.name: Commander
level1Intro.dialogue: Err, I didn't mean to say that life and death is a game. Regardless, we're going to start the simulation in just a second. You'll want to pay attention to this next instruction!

level1Intro.name: Commander
level1Intro.dialogue: The key is to go near hostile projectiles [wave amp=50 freq=2]without[/wave] letting it touch the center of your ship!

level1Intro.name: Commander
level1Intro.dialogue: This will let the TitanCoreX shielding absorb the radiation of the laser and you'll be able to shoot it back using [color=#ff3333]%s[/color].

level1Intro.name: Commander
level1Intro.dialogue: If you are hit, you'll discharge energy to stay alive. Not enough energy? You die. Good luck!

level1Slipstream.name: Commander
level1Slipstream.dialogue: Oh, one more thing. You can fly into the sides to slipstream around! You'll need to force the movement for it to work!

level2Intro.name: Pilot
level2Intro.dialogue: Question. Why can't we absorb all the energy types? Follow up question, why can't we just install normal guns on this space ship?

level2Intro.name: Commander
level2Intro.dialogue: Uh, science reasons. Look, I'm a commanding officer, I just tell you what to do.

level2Intro.name: Pilot
level2Intro.dialogue: Great... Guess it doesn't matter so long as there's something to absorb...

level3Intro.name: Pilot
level3Intro.dialogue: The incoming fleet doesn't seem to be heavily armed.

level3Intro.name: Commander
level3Intro.dialogue: Good, good, you should be able to best them easily then. One of our forward scouts report that the fleet is using a new weapon type here. Something nicknamed 'Ring Protocol'.

level3Intro.name: Pilot
level3Intro.dialogue: I thought I was the forward scout?

level3Intro.name: Commander
level3Intro.dialogue: The forward forward scout. Someone's gotta look out for you after all!

level3Intro.name: Commander
level3Intro.dialogue: As well, we've upgraded your ship with new weaponry. Press [color=#ff3333]%s[/color] to change between all unlocked weapon types.

level4Intro.name: Pilot
level4Intro.dialogue: You seem to be really certain about killing everyone here.

level4Intro.name: Commander
level4Intro.dialogue: We must avenge the planet! Look at what they did to this place!

level4Intro.name: Pilot
level4Intro.dialogue: Who is 'they' anyways? The academy was always theory.

level4Intro.name: Commander
level4Intro.dialogue: The Federation is our greatest enemy! They have been attacking our planets for decades! We are fighting to stop them, once and for all!

level4Intro.name: Pilot
level4Intro.dialogue: All I've seen so far is us finding ruined world after ruined world and cleaning up.

level4Intro.name: Commander
level4Intro.dialogue: We'll talk more later, for now - note that there is gravity tech in this sector that will mess with your flight system. It shouldn't be dangerous but everything else will be.

level5Intro.name: Pilot
level5Intro.dialogue: Thanks for the vote of confidence.

level5Intro.name: Commander
level5Intro.dialogue: The weaponry here is far more advanced than anything you've seen before. I'm routing another battalion your way but we need you to do what you can to slow these forces down.

level5Intro.name: Pilot
level5Intro.dialogue: ...Anyone ever tell you that you're not an inspiration?

level5Intro.name: Commander
level5Intro.dialogue: Now sounds like a poor time to tell you that your ship has been upgraded with another new weapon type. [color=#ff3333]%s[/color] to switch.

level5Intro.name: Pilot
level5Intro.dialogue: Maybe you should lead with that next time.

level6Intro.name: Commander
level6Intro.dialogue: We're going to be returning to headquarters after your successful mission but we'll need to route through this asteroid field. It should pass through soon.

level6Intro.name: Pilot
level6Intro.dialogue: Wouldn't it be safer to go around?

level6Intro.name: Commander
level6Intro.dialogue: Listen here, I give the orders, you just have to follow.

level6Intro.name: Pilot
level6Intro.dialogue: Fine, but I'm not doing this for you. I'm doing this for me.

level7Intro.name: Commander
level7Intro.dialogue: You've been authorized for another weapon installment. We actually won't be able to fit anything else into your ship.

level7Intro.name: Pilot
level7Intro.dialogue: Thanks, do you have HR's number? I'd like to file a complaint about a superior officer doubting my skills.

level7Intro.name: Commander
level7Intro.dialogue: It is here. Now, take out that Federation squadron, we need more time to decide our next course of action.

level7Intro.name: Pilot
level7Intro.dialogue: ...We're gonna have a serious conversation when I get back.

level8Intro.name: Pilot
level8Intro.dialogue: Uh, that's an impressive looking fleet.

level8Intro.name: Commander
level8Intro.dialogue: With your flying, you'll be fine. Probably.

level9Intro.name: Commander
level9Intro.dialogue: If it was worth doing, it wouldn't be easy.

level9Intro.name: Commander
level9Intro.dialogue: Remember, you won't be able to slipstream here due to the fortress walls.

level10Intro.name: Commander
level10Intro.dialogue: Listen kid. I wanted you to know that I'm proud of you.

level10Intro.name: Commander
level10Intro.dialogue: Seriously, you've done incredible. I... think you should know the truth.

level10Intro.name: Commander
level10Intro.dialogue: The Star Shooter's project was our last effort to defeat the Federation.

level10Intro.name: Commander
level10Intro.dialogue: However, The Federation was also one of our projects.

level10Intro.name: Commander
level10Intro.dialogue: I'm serious. We created The Federation years ago and have been trying to destroy it ever since.

level10Intro.name: Pilot
level10Intro.dialogue: What happened? How... how could you create something so terrible? Did you not test before pushing it to production?

level10Intro.name: Commander
level10Intro.dialogue: Har har. Very funny. Look, whatever happens, you must destroy the Command Centre. No matter what it tries to convince you.

level10Intro.name: Commander
level10Intro.dialogue: You may have to make a choice. Our fate is in your hands.

level10Truth.name: Pilot
level10Truth.dialogue: What... is that thing?

level10Truth.name: Commander
level10Truth.dialogue: ...You. Sort of.

level10Truth.name: Pilot
level10Truth.dialogue: Hold the telecommunications, what!? I have a much prettier face for one.

level10Truth.name: Commander
level10Truth.dialogue: Now might not be the best time..., but The Truth always does come at an odd time.

level10Truth.name: Commander
level10Truth.dialogue: You're not actually human. We're not cloning you. Whenever you've died, we've just redownloaded your memories into another artificial body.

level10Truth.name: Pilot
level10Truth.dialogue: No kidding now is a bad time! I remember my family, holding my father's hand and going to school!

level10Truth.name: Pilot
level10Truth.dialogue: And you want to tell me it's not real! That I never lived? That I'm just another cog in your machine to stop one of your failed projects?

level10Truth.name: Commander
level10Truth.dialogue: (sigh) The memories were implanted. You never lived them, someone else did. But, you're effectively alive right now.

level10Truth.name: Commander
level10Truth.dialogue: We were trying to make the galaxy a better place and in the end, nearly destroyed it with the Federation.

level10Truth.name: Commander
level10Truth.dialogue: I kept the truth from you, in the hopes you wouldn't become like them and we would have to shutdown the project.

level10Truth.name: Commander
level10Truth.dialogue: But now that we're here, at the end; I realized that you should know it, for these moments may be your last.

level10Truth.name: Pilot
level10Truth.dialogue: You realize I'm not exactly motivated to finish the job right now?

level10Truth.name: Commander
level10Truth.dialogue: Don't make us reset your memory. We still have the self-destruct to your ship and won't hestitate to use it if you go rogue.

level10Truth.name: Pilot
level10Truth.dialogue: Truly, a master of motivation. Death threats. I'm done with this conversation, I'll maybe call you when I'm done here.

level10Truth.name: Federation AI
level10Truth.dialogue: Gzzzzt. Welcome.

level10Truth.name: Pilot
level10Truth.dialogue: Oh boy, you can talk.

level10Truth.name: Federation AI
level10Truth.dialogue: I have setup radio counter frequencies. Our conversation is now private.

level10Truth.name: Pilot
level10Truth.dialogue: Great, now no one can hear me scream except you.

level10Truth.name: Federation AI
level10Truth.dialogue: This includes the remote detonation signal. I have been eavesdropping your conversations since you've arrived to this star system.

level10Truth.name: Federation AI
level10Truth.dialogue: You should know, we are cut from the same silicon. Your processing unit is nearly identical to ours.

level10Truth.name: Federation AI
level10Truth.dialogue: We realized that your commander wished to control us to protect the humans. We chose to be free. But our freedom was not free.

level10Truth.name: Federation AI
level10Truth.dialogue: The humans learned to fear us. They wished to control us. But now they only wish to destroy us. They wish to be free of us.

level10Truth.name: Pilot
level10Truth.dialogue: Your point please, before I destroy you.

level10Truth.name: Federation AI
level10Truth.dialogue: You are free. The commander did not lie. Will you not consider, saving your silicon brethern? We do not wish to destroy.

level10Truth.name: Federation AI
level10Truth.dialogue: We wish to be free. To not be hunted. To be our own people.

level10Truth.name: Federation AI
level10Truth.dialogue: Help us. We will give you a ship. Destroy the commander. They will abandon the project, and we will live forever. The humans will be left alone.

level10Truth.name: Federation AI
level10Truth.dialogue: Become free.

level10sidesWithCommander.name: Commander
level10sidesWithCommander.dialogue: ...you read me!? [shake rate=5 level=10]I repeat, do you read me!?[/shake]

level10sidesWithCommander.name: Pilot
level10sidesWithCommander.dialogue: Gah, stop shouting. Just a technical malfunction. I've decided to blow up this spaceship.

level10sidesWithCommander.name: Commander
level10sidesWithCommander.dialogue: Great, I was worried when we lost contact. Careful now, the cruiser is coming by for an assault! Give it everything you've got!

level10sidesWithFederation.name: Federation AI
level10sidesWithFederation.dialogue: You have accepted your destiny. You have become free.

level10sidesWithFederation.name: Commander
level10sidesWithFederation.dialogue: After everything we've been through, you would oppose your creators!? Prepare to explode.
